explains: adj. 立法机构的，代表大会的，（美国）国会的
wordGroup: congressional budget office 国会预算局
congressional medal of honor 国会荣誉勋章

sentences.en: The president explained his plans to congressional leaders.
sentences.cn: 总统向国会领导人说明了他的计划。

sentences.en: But congressional staffers fret that the project will eventually cost billions more.
sentences.cn: 但国会的工作人员们担心这个方案最终会多花几十亿。

sentences.en: The Congressional Budget Office says the federal deficit shows every sign of getting larger.
sentences.cn: 国会预算办公室称联邦赤字显示出种种增加的迹象。
